text: Edwin Rees Beynon (17 November 1924 – February 2002) was a Welsh professional footballer who played as an inside forward. He made appearances in the English Football League for Wrexham and Shrewsbury Town. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Welsh footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Shrewsbury Town F.C. players Category:Telford United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Eddie Beynon
